message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think it's a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it offers.
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective. While I'm looking to get closer to my asking price, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it offers.
